title: Component AsRef change causes beta regression

labels.name: T-libs-api
labels.description: Relevant to the library API team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

body:
**This is probably going to be closed as expected breakage. This means those cc-ed below should probably aim to fix their crate and release a new point release.**

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/46985 added an impl of `AsRef<Path> for Component` which causes these crates to stop compiling:

 - [artifact-app 1.1.0-beta001](https://crates.io/crates/artifact-app/1.1.0-beta001) https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/47466 cc @vitiral
 - [app_dirs 1.1.1](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/47466) (https://github.com/AndyBarron/app-dirs-rs/issues/28) https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/47480 cc @AndyBarron
 - [gutenberg 0.0.7](https://crates.io/crates/gutenberg/0.0.7) [log](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/stable-1.24.0-beta-1.25.0-beta.2/beta-2018-02-20/reg/gutenberg-0.0.7/log.txt) cc @Keats
 - [rst_app 0.3.7](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/stable-1.24.0-beta-1.25.0-beta.2/beta-2018-02-20/reg/rst_app-0.3.7/log.txt) cc @vitiral
 - [second_law 0.2.2 and 0.3.1](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/stable-1.24.0-beta-1.25.0-beta.2/beta-2018-02-20/reg/second_law-0.3.1/log.txt) cc @nathanross
 - [tack-it-on 1.0.1](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/stable-1.24.0-beta-1.25.0-beta.2/beta-2018-02-20/reg/tack-it-on-1.0.1/log.txt) cc @ChrisWellsWood
 - [tango 0.6.2 and 0.8.1](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/stable-1.24.0-beta-1.25.0-beta.2/beta-2018-02-20/reg/tango-0.6.2/log.txt) cc @pnkfelix 
- [yabs 0.2.1](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/stable-1.24.0-beta-1.25.0-beta.2/beta-2018-02-20/reg/yabs-0.2.1/log.txt) cc @0X1A
 - [Redrield/kobalt-updater @ 6cd602b7ccf16336c8acc1c4d808b37152c648f7](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/stable-1.24.0-beta-1.25.0-beta.2/beta-2018-02-20/gh/Redrield.kobalt-updater.6cd602b7ccf16336c8acc1c4d808b37152c648f7/log.txt) cc @Redrield
 - [vitiral/artifact @ ed4d744c67d8a7ed41c202b0ac81e2ae2720b3fb](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/stable-1.24.0-beta-1.25.0-beta.2/beta-2018-02-20/gh/vitiral.artifact.ed4d744c67d8a7ed41c202b0ac81e2ae2720b3fb/log.txt) cc @vitiral 

Estimated ecosystem breakage: 143 versions (0.18% of versions published), 39 crates (0.27% of crates).

cc @rust-lang/libs
